H0.text: Who is the Greek equivalent of the Roman god Saturn. Zeus

H1.text: Who is the Greek equivalent of the Roman god Saturn. Poseidon

H2.text: Who is the Greek equivalent of the Roman god Saturn. Hades

H3.text: Who is the Greek equivalent of the Roman god Saturn. Kronos (Cronus)

A4.text: Cronus was also identified in classical antiquity with the Roman deity Saturn.

A5.text: The planet Saturn, named after the Roman equivalent of Cronus, is still referred to as 'Cronus' in modern Greek.
